questions: What is the capability of Tracardi to fetch contact information from ActiveCampaign?
How to fetch ActiveCampaign contact info using Tracardi?
What is the plugin used to fetch contact information from ActiveCampaign using Tracardi?
answer:
# Can Tracardi fetch contact information from ActiveCampaign based on the given email address?
Yes, Tracardi can fetch ActiveCampaign contact info based on the given email address using the "Fetch contact" plugin
